body.name: OLAYMEY Steamer for Clothes 2 in 1 Handheld Clothing Steamer 1800W Portable Non leakage Travel Steamer Iron Perfect for Removing Wrinkles from Garments Fabrics
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 26 - March 1 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 💦💨[EFFECTIVELY REMOVES WRINKLES] OLAYMEY Steamer for clothes is equipped with 1800W steamer motor, emit 25g/min continuous steam after 30s of rapid pre-heat, the steam iron is made of ceramic-coated cast aluminum heating plate, which has improved heat conduction and ironing effect, instantly removes creases from your clothes. Using the pulse force refreshing the fabrics in your home at the same time.

💦💨[Large Capacity, Work Longer] The clothes steamer with a removable 5.07 oz. water tank that can steam continuously for 10-15 minutes, eliminating the need for frequent water changes. Transparent water tank design allows you to keep track of water volume changes. Garment steamer can easily soften, refresh and wrinkle release a variety of fabrics, including clothing, bedding, curtains, upholstered furniture and more.

💦💨[360° NO LEAKAGE] The leak-proof design of this 2-in-1 iron for clothes will not leak or spill whether you steam vertically or horizontally. Through upgraded iteration, this steamer will not produce condensation, don't have to worry about your clothes getting wet anymore. We will test the quality of the steamer basket before shipping, if you find a little water in the tank is normal!

💦💨[TRAVEL PORTABLE SIZE] Forget the heavy traditional iron machine, this handheld steamer is compact and lightweight, no ironing board required, you can iron it anytime, anywhere, fabric steamer effectively removing stubborn creases on any fabrics including cotton, wool, silk, fiber, etc. without harming your clothes. Take the portable travel steamer to business trip, travel, keep your best condition at all times! This is the best friend birthday gifts for women!

💦💨[SAFETY TRUST] OLAYMEY for the clothing steamer into the exclusive design of the safety control chip, even if no water dry burning do not have to worry about, fully guarantee your use of safety. Steamer can only be used in the United States, Canada, Japan and other 110-120V countries and regions. However, plugging into 220V-240V or non-110-120V outlets will damage the product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPECIFICATION: Unit Weight (Bare): 0.65kg. Water Tank Capacity: 150ml. Wattage: 1800W. Voltage: 110-120V, 50/60Hz. Warm Tips: Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.
Use the product in 360° without worrying about moisture leakage.
Removing wrinkles is so easy with the help of the powerful penetrating steam emitted by the 1800W motor!

Make Your Life Easier With OLAYMEY Handheld Steamer NOTE: * The steamer is designed for American voltage standard, only applicable to 110V voltage. * Any other chemical substance added to the water may cause water spurting out from the nozzle. Distilled or purified water must be used to prevent water spurting out. * If tap water is used, please dump all the water out after each usage and do not reuse the water. * Steam coming out from the nozzle can be very hot. Please never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself or pointing the nozzle against any human or pet. * If water is spurting out, there is probably some residue in the water tank. Please clean it with vinegar or lemon water (Suggested ratio : water to vinegar: 8 :2. Water to lemon: 7:3 ). Dump the water after boiling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent performance and versatility make it a must-have for anyone who values the care of their clothes and home textiles. Say goodbye to wrinkled old clothes in your closet and enjoy perfect wrinkle-free results. I am very happy with this purchase and I heartily recommend it to anyone who needs a reliable and efficient fabric steam iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's like a charm
reviews.reviewText: This 2-in-1 handheld wall iron is perfect. I use it much more than I thought I would. It works great, removes wrinkles quickly, and makes my clothes look brand new. I love how easy it is to use and how quickly it eliminates shirt creases. I definitely recommend this product!
